title: What are my out of warranty repair solutions for my Pixel 2 XL in Switzerland?
content:
I have contacted "Ctdi" for a repair (Authorized Google repair) but they can only serve customers in the EU (Switzerland is not in EU).
I have searched the community for help but to no avail. There is a page that lists the pixel repair places around the world but I get a 404 not found. A few posts link this page so it would be useful. Its title is "get your pixel fixed out of warranty".
I used the chat on my Pixel  to get in contact with support, they said they would get back to me in 24-48 hours, 1 week later, no answer.
I have contacted the store I bought my phone but they have not answered yet.
Anyone have a similar experience?

Regards,
Nevin
